data.name: CVE-2008-0521
data.document: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in Bubbling Library 1.32 allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the uri parameter to dispatcher.php in (1) examples/dispatcher/framework/, (2) examples/dispatcher/, (3) examples/wizard/, and (4) PHP/, different vectors than CVE-2008-0545.

data.name: CVE-2008-0652
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in index.php in the Downloads (com_downloads) component for Mambo and Joomla! allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the filecatid parameter in a selectfolder action.

data.name: CVE-2008-0874
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in index.php in the eEmpregos module for XOOPS allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the cid parameter in a view action.

data.name: CVE-2008-0309
data.document: Stack-based buffer overflow in Symantec Decomposer, as used in certain Symantec antivirus products including Symantec Scan Engine 5.1.2 and other versions before 5.1.6.31, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a malformed RAR file to the Internet Content Adaptation Protocol (ICAP) port (1344/tcp).

productNames: symantec antivirus scan engine for microsoft sharepoint
symantec antivirus scan engine for ms isa
symantec mail security for microsoft exchange

references.name: 20080226 Symantec Scan Engine 5.1.2 RAR File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

data.name: CVE-2008-1511
data.document: Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in ooComments 1.0 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the PathToComment parameter for (1) classes/class_admin.php and (2) classes/class_comments.php.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.

data.name: CVE-2008-1038
data.document: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in mod/mod.extmanager.php in DBHcms 1.1.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the extmanager_install parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0917
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Tor World Tor Search 1.1 and earlier, I-Navigator 4.0, Mobile Frontier 2.1 and earlier, Diary.cgi (aka Quotes of the Day) 1.5 and earlier, Tor News 1.21 and earlier, Simple BBS 1.3 and earlier, Interactive BBS 1.3 and earlier, Tor Board 1.1 and earlier, Simple Vote 1.1 and earlier, and Com Vote 1.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

data.name: CVE-2008-0944
data.document: Ipswitch Instant Messaging (IM) 2.0.8.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL dereference and application crash) via a version field containing zero.

references.name: 20080207 Multiple vulnerabilities in Ipswitch Instant Messaging 2.0.8.1

data.name: CVE-2008-0603
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in index.php in the amazOOP Awesom! (com_awesom) 0.3.2component for Mambo and Joomla! allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the listid parameter in a viewlist task.

data.name: CVE-2008-0928
data.document: Qemu 0.9.1 and earlier does not perform range checks for block device read or write requests, which allows guest host users with root privileges to access arbitrary memory and escape the virtual machine.

data.name: CVE-2008-0688

data.name: CVE-2008-0880
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in modules.php in the EasyContent module for PHP-Nuke allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the page_id parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0575
data.document: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in admin/admincenter.php in webSPELL 4.01.02 allows remote attackers to assign the superadmin privilege level to arbitrary accounts as administrators via an "update member" action.

data.name: CVE-2008-0923
data.document: Directory traversal vulnerability in the Shared Folders feature for VMWare ACE 1.0.2 and 2.0.2, Player 1.0.4 and 2.0.2, and Workstation 5.5.4 and 6.0.2 allows guest OS users to read and write arbitrary files on the host OS via a multibyte string that produces a wide character string containing .. (dot dot) sequences, which bypasses the protection mechanism, as demonstrated using a "%c0%2e%c0%2e" string.

references.name: [security-announce] 20080317 VMSA-2008-0005 Updated VMware Workstation, VMware Player, VMware Server, VMware ACE, and VMware Fusion resolve critical security issues

data.document: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Clever Copy 3.0 and earlier allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) ID parameter to postcomment.php and the (2) album parameter to gallery.php.

data.name: CVE-2008-0587
data.document: Buffer overflow in the uspchrp program in devices.chrp.base.diag in IBM AIX 5.2 and 5.3 allows local users to gain privileges via unspecified vectors.

data.name: CVE-2008-1040
data.document: Buffer overflow in the Single Sign-On function in Fujitsu Interstage Application Server 8.0.0 through 8.0.3 and 9.0.0, Interstage Studio 8.0.1 and 9.0.0, and Interstage Apworks 8.0.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long URI.

productNames: interstage application server standard j v9.0.0.0
interstage application server standard j v9.0.0a

data.name: CVE-2008-0425
data.document: Absolute path traversal vulnerability in explorerdir.php in Frimousse 0.0.2 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files and list arbitrary directories via a full pathname in the name parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0983
data.document: lighttpd 1.4.18, and possibly other versions before 1.5.0, does not properly calculate the size of a file descriptor array, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a large number of connections, which triggers an out-of-bounds access.

data.name: CVE-2008-0667
data.document: The DOC.print function in the Adobe JavaScript API, as used by Adobe Acrobat and Reader before 8.1.2, allows remote attackers to configure silent non-interactive printing, and trigger the printing of an arbitrary number of copies of a document.  NOTE: this issue might be subsumed by CVE-2008-0655.

references.name: 20080208 Adobe Reader/Acrobat Remote PDF Print Silently Vulnerability

data.name: CVE-2008-0690
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in index.php in the mosDirectory (com_directory) 2.3.2 component for Joomla! allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the catid parameter in a viewcat action.

data.name: CVE-2008-0921
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in news.php in beContent 0.3.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0407
data.document: HTTP File Server (HFS) before 2.2c tags HTTP request log entries with the username sent during HTTP Basic Authentication, regardless of whether authentication succeeded, which might make it more difficult for an administrator to determine who made a remote request.

references.name: 20080123 Syhunt: HFS (HTTP File Server) Username Spoofing and Log Forging/Injection Vulnerability

data.name: CVE-2008-0008
data.document: The pa_drop_root function in PulseAudio 0.9.8, and a certain 0.9.9 build, does not check return values from (1) setresuid, (2) setreuid, (3) setuid, and (4) seteuid calls when attempting to drop privileges, which might allow local users to gain privileges by causing those calls to fail via attacks such as resource exhaustion.

data.name: CVE-2008-0679
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in index.php in BlogPHP 2.0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the search parameter.

references.name: 20080130 [waraxe-2008-SA#065] - Remote Shell Command Execution in Coppermine 1.4.14
Coppermine Photo Gallery picEditor.php Command Execution

data.name: CVE-2008-0445
data.document: The replace_inline_img function in elogd in Electronic Logbook (ELOG) before 2.7.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via crafted logbook entries.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.

data.name: CVE-2008-0606
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in index.php in the Shambo2 (com_shambo2) component for Mambo and Joomla! allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the Itemid parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0576
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Project Issue Tracking module 5.x-2.x-dev before 20080130 in the 5.x-2.x series, 5.x-1.2 and earlier in the 5.x-1.x series, 4.7.x-2.6 and earlier in the 4.7.x-2.x series, and 4.7.x-1.6 and earlier in the 4.7.x-1.x series for Drupal allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors that write to summary table pages.

data.name: CVE-2008-0361
data.document: Directory traversal vulnerability in agregar_info.php in GradMan 0.1.3 and earlier allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrary local files via a .. (dot dot) in the tabla parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-1049
data.document: Unspecified vulnerability in Parallels SiteStudio before 1.7.2, and 1.8.x before 1.8b, as used in Parallels H-Sphere 3.0 before Patch 9 and 2.5 before Patch 11, has unknown impact and attack vectors.

data.name: CVE-2008-0356
data.document: Buffer overflow in the Independent Management Architecture (IMA) service in Citrix Presentation Server (MetaFrame Presentation Server) 4.5 and earlier, Access Essentials 2.0 and earlier, and Desktop Server 1.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an invalid size value in a packet to TCP port 2512 or 2513.

references.name: 20080117 ZDI-08-002: Citrix Presentation Server IMA Service Heap Overflow Vulnerability

data.name: CVE-2008-1114
data.document: Vocera Communications wireless handsets, when using Protected Extensible Authentication Protocol (PEAP), do not validate server certificates, which allows remote wireless access points to steal hashed passwords and conduct man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks.

references.name: 20080221 Cisco and Vocera wireless LAN VoIP devices don't check certificates

data.name: CVE-2008-0563
data.document: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in service/impl/UserLocalServiceImpl.java in Liferay Portal 4.3.6 allows remote attackers to perform unspecified actions as unspecified authenticated users via the User-Agent HTTP header, which is used when composing Forgot Password e-mail messages in HTML format.

data.name: CVE-2008-0564
data.document: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Mailman before 2.1.10b1 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors related to (1) editing templates and (2) the list's "info attribute" in the web administrator interface, a different vulnerability than CVE-2006-3636.

data.name: CVE-2008-0650
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in login.php in Simple OS CMS 0.1c beta allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the username field.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.

data.name: CVE-2008-0424
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in blog.php in Mooseguy Blog System (MGBS) 1.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the month parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0455
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the mod_negotiation module in the Apache HTTP Server 2.2.6 and earlier in the 2.2.x series, 2.0.61 and earlier in the 2.0.x series, and 1.3.39 and earlier in the 1.3.x series allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML by uploading a file with a name containing XSS sequences and a file extension, which leads to injection within a (1) "406 Not Acceptable" or (2) "300 Multiple Choices" HTTP response when the extension is omitted in a request for the file.

references.name: 20080122 Apache mod_negotiation Xss and Http Response Splitting

20080125 C4 Security Advisory - GE Fanuc Cimplicity 6.1 Heap Overflow

data.name: CVE-2008-0354

data.name: CVE-2008-0680
data.document: SNMPd in MikroTik RouterOS 3.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via a crafted SNMP SET request.

data.name: CVE-2008-0475
data.document: ManageEngine Applications Manager 8.1 build 8100 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information ( Home->Summary) via an invalid URI, as demonstrated by the "/-" URI.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.

data.name: CVE-2008-0512
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in index.php in the fq (com_fq) component for Mambo and Joomla! allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the listid parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0859
data.document: Unspecified vulnerability in Kerio MailServer before 6.5.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via unspecified vectors related to decoding of uuencoded input, which triggers memory corruption.

data.name: CVE-2008-1041
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in mwhois.php in Matt Wilson Matt's Whois (MWhois) allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the domain parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0006
data.document: Buffer overflow in (1) X.Org Xserver before 1.4.1, and (2) the libfont and libXfont libraries on some platforms including Sun Solaris, allows context-dependent attackers to execute arbitrary code via a PCF font with a large difference between the last col and first col values in the PCF_BDF_ENCODINGS table.

references.name: [xorg] 20080117 X.Org security advisory: multiple vulnerabilities in the X server

data.name: CVE-2008-0446
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in voircom.php in LulieBlog 1.02 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0557
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in index.php in the CatalogShop (com_catalogshop) 1.0b1 componenent for Mambo and Joomla! allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter in a detail action.

data.name: CVE-2008-0635
data.document: Unspecified vulnerability in the delivery engine in Openads 2.4.0 through 2.4.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via unknown vectors.

data.name: CVE-2008-0631
data.document: Multiple ActiveX controls in MailBee.dll in MailBee Objects 5.5 allow remote attackers to (1) overwrite arbitrary files via the SaveToDisk method, or (2) modify files via the AddStringToFile method.

data.name: CVE-2008-0162
data.document: misc.c in splitvt 1.6.6 and earlier does not drop group privileges before executing xprop, which allows local users to gain privileges.

data.name: CVE-2008-1129
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in admin/users/self.php in XRMS CRM allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the msg parameter.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.

references.name: 20080228 XSS on XRMS- open source CRM

data.name: CVE-2008-0601
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in index.php in All Club CMS (ACCMS) 0.0.1f and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the name parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0882
data.document: Double free vulnerability in the process_browse_data function in CUPS 1.3.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via crafted UDP Browse packets to the cupsd port (631/udp), related to an unspecified manipulation of a remote printer.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.

data.name: CVE-2008-0489
data.document: Directory traversal vulnerability in install.php in Clansphere 2007.4.4 allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrary local files via a .. (dot dot) in the lang parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0870
data.document: BEA WebLogic Portal 10.0 and 9.2 through Maintenance Pack 2, under certain circumstances, can redirect a user from the https:// URI for the Portal Administration Console to an http URI, which allows remote attackers to sniff the session.

data.name: CVE-2008-0980
data.document: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Spyce - Python Server Pages (PSP) 2.1.3 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1) the url or type parameter to docs/examples/redirect.spy; (2) the x parameter to docs/examples/handlervalidate.spy; (3) the name parameter to spyce/examples/request.spy; (4) the Name parameter to spyce/examples/getpost.spy; (5) the mytextarea parameter, the mypass parameter, or an empty parameter to spyce/examples/formtag.spy; (6) the newline parameter to the default URI under demos/chat/; (7) the text1 parameter to docs/examples/formintro.spy; or (8) the mytext or mydate parameter to docs/examples/formtag.spy.

references.name: 20080219 PR08-01: Several XSS, a cross-domain redirect and a webroot disclosure on Spyce - Python Server Pages (PSP)

data.name: CVE-2008-0579
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in index.php in the buslicense (com_buslicense) component for Joomla! allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the aid parameter in a list action.

data.name: CVE-2008-0303
data.document: The FTP print feature in multiple Canon printers, including imageRUNNER and imagePRESS, allow remote attackers to use the server as an inadvertent proxy via a modified PORT command, aka FTP bounce.

data.name: CVE-2008-0588
data.document: Buffer overflow in the utape program in devices.scsi.tape.diag in IBM AIX 5.2 and 5.3 allows local users to gain privileges via unspecified vectors.

data.name: CVE-2008-0431
data.document: Directory traversal vulnerability in administrator/download.php in IDMOS (aka Phoenix) 1.0 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the fileName parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0841
data.document: SQL injection vulnerability in index.php in the Giorgio Nordo Ricette (com_ricette) 1.0 component for Joomla! and Mambo allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0494
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in vpnum/userslist.php in Endian Firewall 2.1.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the psearch parameter.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.

data.name: CVE-2008-0836
data.document: Unspecified vulnerability in the vuidmice STREAMS modules in Sun Solaris 9 and 10 on x86 architectures allows local users to cause a denial of service (panic) via unspecified vectors that trigger a NULL pointer dereference in the vuid3ps2 module, a different issue than CVE-2007-5319.

data.name: CVE-2008-0567
data.document: Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in ChronoEngine ChronoForms (com_chronocontact) 2.3.5 component for Joomla! allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the mosConfig_absolute_path parameter to (1) PPS/File.php, (2) Writer.php, and (3) PPS.php in excelwriter/; and (4) BIFFwriter.php, (5) Workbook.php, (6) Worksheet.php, and (7) Format.php in excelwriter/Writer/.

data.name: CVE-2008-0974
data.document: Double-Take 5.0.0.2865 and earlier, distributed under the HP StorageWorks Storage Mirroring name and other names, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon termination) via (1) a large vector<T> value, which raises a "vector<T> too long" exception; or (2) a certain packet that raises an ospace/time/src\date.cpp exception.

data.name: CVE-2008-0596
data.document: Memory leak in CUPS before 1.1.22, and possibly other versions, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption and daemon crash) via a large number of requests to add and remove shared printers.

data.name: CVE-2008-0414
data.document: Mozilla Firefox before 2.0.0.12 and SeaMonkey before 1.1.8 allows user-assisted remote attackers to trick the user into uploading arbitrary files via label tags that shift focus to a file input field, aka "focus spoofing."

data.name: CVE-2008-0669
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in search.cgi in Sift Unity allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the qt parameter.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.

data.name: CVE-2008-0834
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Lotus Quickr for i5/OS before 8.0.0.2 Hotfix 11, when anonymous access is disabled on HTTP ports, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

data.name: CVE-2008-1505
data.document: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in the SSTREAMTV custompages (com_custompages) 1.1 and earlier component for Joomla! allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the cpage parameter to index.php.

data.name: CVE-2008-1045
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the file tree navigation function in system/workplace/views/explorer/tree_files.jsp in Alkacon OpenCMS 7.0.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the resource parameter.

data.name: CVE-2008-0591
data.document: Mozilla Firefox before 2.0.0.12 and Thunderbird before 2.0.0.12 does not properly manage a delay timer used in confirmation dialogs, which might allow remote attackers to trick users into confirming an unsafe action, such as remote file execution, by using a timer to change the window focus, aka the "dialog refocus bug" or "ffclick2".

data.name: CVE-2008-1125
data.document: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in Podcast Generator 1.0 BETA 2 and earlier allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the (1) theme_path parameter to core/themes.php and the (2) filename parameter to download.php.

data.name: CVE-2008-0444
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Electronic Logbook (ELOG) before 2.7.0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via subtext parameter to unspecified components.

data.name: CVE-2008-0869
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in BEA WebLogic Workshop 8.1 through SP6 and Workshop for WebLogic 9.0 through 10.0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a "framework defined request parameter" when using WebLogic Workshop or Apache Beehive NetUI framework with page flows.

data.name: CVE-2008-0172
data.document: The get_repeat_type function in basic_regex_creator.hpp in the Boost regex library (aka Boost.Regex) in Boost 1.33 and 1.34 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL dereference and crash) via an invalid regular expression.

data.name: CVE-2008-0466
data.document: Web Wiz RTE_file_browser.asp in, as used in Web Wiz Rich Text Editor 4.0, Web Wiz Forums 9.07, and Web Wiz Newspad 1.02, does not require authentication, which allows remote attackers to list directories and read files.  NOTE: this can be leveraged for listings outside the configured directory tree by exploiting a separate directory traversal vulnerability.

references.name: 20080123 Web Wiz Rich Text Editor Directory traversal + HTM/HTML filecreation on the server

data.name: CVE-2008-1066
data.document: The modifier.regex_replace.php plugin in Smarty before 2.6.19, as used by Serendipity (S9Y) and other products, allows attackers to call arbitrary PHP functions via templates, related to a '\0' character in a search string.

data.name: CVE-2008-1130
data.document: Unspecified vulnerability in IBM WebSphere MQ 6.0.x before 6.0.2.2 and 5.3 before Fix Pack 14 allows attackers to bypass access restrictions for a queue manager via a SVRCONN (MQ client) channel.

data.name: CVE-2008-1042
data.document: Directory traversal vulnerability in include/body.inc.php in Linux Web Shop (LWS) php Download Manager 1.0 and 1.1 allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrary local files via a .. (dot dot) in the content parameter.
